taco-kits.exception.kitMetadataFileNotFo: Error: The kit metadata file is not found. Please fix this by re-installing taco-kits from npm.
_taco-kits.exception.kitMetadataFileNotF: Error thrown when the TacoKitMetadata.json file is not found
taco-kits.exception.kitMetadataFileMalfo: Error: The kit metadata file is corrupt. Please fix this by re-installing taco-kits from npm.
_taco-kits.exception.kitMetadataFileMalf: Error thrown when the TacoKitMetadata.json is malformed
taco-kits.exception.InvalidKit: Error: {0} is not a known Kit.
_taco-kits.exception.InvalidKit.comment: Error shown when the user specifies an unknown kit identifier. {0} is the kit identifier that the user specified as parameter in the command line.
_taco-kits.exception.DeprecatedKitWarnin: Error shown when the user specifies a kit that is deprecated.
taco-kits.exception.DeprecatedKitMessage: Consider changing your project to use a more recent Kit. For deprecation information, see {todo_fwdLink}
_taco-kits.exception.DeprecatedKitMessag: Helpful message shown when the user specifies deprecated kit identifier.
taco-kits.exception.NoDefaultKit: Error: No default kit found. Please fix this by re-installing taco-kits from npm or run "taco kit list" to see the list of available kits
_taco-kits.exception.NoDefaultKit.commen: Error thrown when no default kit is specified in the kit metadata file, TacoKitMetadata.json
taco-kits.exception.NoCliSpecification: Error: No Cordova CLI specification is found for kit {0}. The kit metadata file appears to be corrupt. Please fix this by re-installing taco-kits from npm or run "taco kit list" to see the list of available kits
Error thrown when no Cordova CLI is specified for the kit {0} in the kit metadata file, TacoKitMetadata.json
_taco-kits.exception.InvalidTemplate.com: Error shown when the user specifies an unknown template identifier. {0} is the template identifier that the user specified as parameter in the command line.
taco-kits.exception.TypescriptNotSupport: Error: This version of Cordova does not contain a TypeScript template
_taco-kits.exception.TypescriptNotSuppor: Error shown when the user specifies a TypeScript template, but there is no such template available for the selected kit.
